abstract: Iranian Judge Abolghassem Salavati, who was blacklisted by European Union in 2011 for human rights abuses, announces that no one other than defendant and his lawyer will be permitted in courtroom during espionage trial of Washington Post reporter Jason Rezaian; denies access to Rezian's mother and wife, who had been told they would be able to attend.
lead_paragraph: Jason Rezaian, the Washington Post reporter in Tehran accused of espionage, will appear at his trial on Tuesday accompanied only by his lawyer.

headline.main: Iran Judge Closes Reporter’s Trial, Ignoring Pleas for Transparency
headline.print_headline: Post Reporter Held in Iran Will Face Closed Trial
